item.title: Milestone 1
item.description: Milestone 1 Milestone 1: ABHA creation and capture & verification for seamless patient registration Test Cases The Milestone 1 test cases are applicable to All the stakeholders. S.No Function Functionality Test Case Steps To Be Executed 1.1 ABHA Creation Through Aadhaar OTP Mandatory Create ABHA Option (CRT_ABHA_101) The system must provide an option to create ABHA through Aadhaar OTP 1.2 ABHA Creation Through Aadhaar OTP Mandatory Consent collection (CRT_ABHA_102) The system must display the consent language/ disclaimer language and collect user’s consent as per the ABDM published consent.
